description: This file defines the SessionMetrics class, which encapsulates various metrics related to a session, including token counts, timing, and additional metrics. It also provides methods for timing control and combining metrics.

classes.name: SessionMetrics
classes.description: A data class that tracks various metrics for a session, including token counts, timing, and additional custom metrics. It supports timing operations and combining metrics from multiple sessions or messages.

methods.name: start_timer
methods.description: Initializes and starts the internal timer if it is not already running.

methods.name: stop_timer
methods.description: Stops the internal timer and optionally records the elapsed time.

methods.name: set_time_to_first_token
methods.description: Records the elapsed time until the first token was generated.

methods.name: __add__
methods.description: Defines addition for SessionMetrics objects, combining their metrics and timing information.

methods.name: __radd__
methods.description: Supports sum() and other operations by defining right-side addition.
